verses.name: Leviticus 11:12
verses.text: Whatsoever hath no fins nor scales in the waters, that shall be an abomination unto you.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:13
verses.text: And these are they which ye shall have in abomination among the fowls; they shall not be eaten, they are an abomination: the eagle, and the ossifrage, and the ospray,

verses.name: Leviticus 11:14
verses.text: And the vulture, and the kite after his kind;

verses.name: Leviticus 11:16
verses.text: And the owl, and the night hawk, and the cuckow, and the hawk after his kind,

verses.name: Leviticus 11:17
verses.text: And the little owl, and the cormorant, and the great owl,

verses.name: Leviticus 11:18
verses.text: And the swan, and the pelican, and the gier eagle,
